General.Name: Tat Gida Sanayi AS
General.Description: Tat Gida Sanayi A.S., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the production, distribution, marketing, trade, and brokerage of semi-finished and finished goods in Turkey and internationally. It offers tomato paste, pepper paste, mixed paste, organic pastes, tomato products, canned vegetables, canned peas, grilled foods, pickles, boiled foods, and corn products; and ketchup, spicy and organic ketchup, mayonnaise, garlic mayonnaise, mustard, hot sauce, burger sauce, ranch sauce, barbecue sauce, peri peri sauce, and pasta sauce. The company's products also include canned ready-meals, ready-to-eat meals, boiled foods, organic boiled foods, bread spreads, soups, jams, and marmalade goods. The company was formerly known as Tat Konserve Sanayii AS. and changed its name to Tat Gida Sanayi A.S. in November 2013. Tat Gida Sanayi A.S. was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

1.Name: Ms. Basak Tekin Özden
